name: MP3 Scraper
author: Jordan Andree • Skorinc

sections.description:
A plugin that will scrape any html links to mp3 files in a post or page content area and convert them to secure flash embeds, utilizing the 1 Bit Audio Player.

Plugin’s Official Site

http://noblegiant.com/blog/2010/09/mp3-scraper
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire mp3-scraper folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘MP3 Scraper’ menu in your WordPress admin panel under Settings where you can change the global color and size.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with MP3 Scraper? Use these support channels appropriately.

  1. Docs
  2. FAQ
  3. Support Forum
  4. WordPress HelpCenter

Support

upgrade_notice: The required WordPress version has been changed and now requires WordPress 2.9 or higher. If you use WordPress 2.8, you will need to upgrade WordPress.
